name: mywebsite-backend

scripts.build: echo '=== Starting TypeScript compilation ===' && echo 'TypeScript version:' && tsc --version && echo 'Running tsc...' && tsc --listEmittedFiles 2>&1 || (echo 'TypeScript compilation had errors (check above)' && exit 1) && echo '=== Compilation completed ===' && echo 'Checking dist folder...' && ls -la dist/ 2>&1 && echo 'Checking for dist/index.js...' && test -f dist/index.js && echo '✓ dist/index.js exists' || (echo '✗ ERROR: dist/index.js not found after compilation!' && exit 1)
scripts.postbuild: test -f dist/index.js || (echo 'ERROR: dist/index.js not found after build!' && exit 1)
scripts.prestart: pwd && echo 'Current directory:' && ls -la && echo 'Checking dist folder:' && ls -la dist/ 2>&1 || echo 'dist folder does not exist!'
scripts.start: if [ ! -f dist/index.js ]; then echo 'ERROR: dist/index.js not found! Attempting build...' && npm run build || exit 1; fi && node dist/index.js

description: Backend server za mywebsite sa Express, Supabase i Socket.io
